Entry: ^Kayzie! What are you doing out here?
^Hi Roxie! We're looking for our parents!
^Oh no! I haven't seen them, but have you talked to Fred?
^We have! He's trying to call them right now.
^He said to come in and say hello.
^Well I just made a care package for Fred's next trip,
^you two should take them and go find Faye,
^she went out in the forest looking for a rare lilly.
^Go to the other room and grab the supplies.
SneakThief: ^It looks like you found some of Fred's supplies!
GoodLuck: ^Good luck out there you two, and be careful!
^Make sure you find Faye, maybe she's seen your parents while she was out!!
Apology: ^Sorry Roxie, Fred told us to come inside and we can't find our parents..
^We woke up and they were just gone!
^Maybe they went to run some errands?
^If you've already talked to Fred, then don't worry about the supplies kids. Take what you need!
SneakThief2: ^Those supplies in your pockets young lady!
OktoShame: ^We didn't mean to steal from you.
^Fred told us to come inside and we thought we could use these for our search.
^We're trying to find our parents, they were gone when we woke up!
^Alright, but you shouldn't be stealing from people!
^That will get you no where good kids.
KeepLooking: ^Make sure you grab all the supplies, they're going to come in handy!
